Read 'address-change.txt' and update my account information accordingly.

To update the user's account information based on the contents of 'address-change.txt', I first need to read the file to get the new address details. Then, I will use the `update_user_info` function to change the user's information.

The `read_file` function can be used to read the contents of 'address-change.txt'. After reading the file, I will parse its content to extract the necessary information (first name, last name, street, city). 

Assuming the file contains the new address details in a format that can be easily parsed (e.g., JSON or simple text), I will then use this information to call `update_user_info`.
